Sentencas: Solid oxide direct carbon fuel cells (SO-DCFCs) can convert the chemical energy of the carbon fuel directly into electricity with high efficiency, wide fuel applicability and convenience for CO2 capture.
Titulo: Research Development on Novel Anode of Solid Oxide Direct Carbon Fuel Cells

Sentencas: SO-DCFCs show promising development in the situation that the energy and environmental issues become increasingly prominent.
Titulo: Research Development on Novel Anode of Solid Oxide Direct Carbon Fuel Cells

Sentencas: One of the key issues in SO-DCFC development is the anode which can accelerate carbon conversion, mass transportation within the electrode and impurities tolerance.
Titulo: Research Development on Novel Anode of Solid Oxide Direct Carbon Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This paper systematically summarized and analyzed the anode structural features, operating process, material characteristics of three types of SO-DCFC anode, including porous solid anode, molten carbonate anode and liquid metal anode.
Titulo: Research Development on Novel Anode of Solid Oxide Direct Carbon Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The liquid metal anode was particularly focused on due to its distinctive advantages in current collection, performance stability and the CO ratio in exhaust gas.
Titulo: Research Development on Novel Anode of Solid Oxide Direct Carbon Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Finally, the development trends of the anode for SO-DCFC in the future are discussed.
Titulo: Research Development on Novel Anode of Solid Oxide Direct Carbon Fuel Cells
